thread.title: Will Perrin

author: Will Perrin
title: Will Perrin
text: I have a requirement to transfer money to Japan from time to time to support my son who is a student in Tokyo. Having looked into the most reliable and fast way to transfer money I found that OFX formerly UKForex was the one that gave me the service and security peace of mind. I would have no hesitation in recommending their service to anyone who needs to move funds abroad.
